RAN2.original: ~r~You were meant to dump the car in the river.~s~
PLACEHOLDER MOCAP~n~Louis's ex-girlfriend turns out to be crazy.~n~She thinks Louis is cheating on her~n~and has planted a car bomb in the women's car.~n~Player must deal with the bomb.
RAN2.translated: PLACEHOLDER MOCAP~n~Louis的前女友已经疯了。~n~她觉得Louis劈腿了~n~并在那个女人的车上装了一枚汽车炸弹~n~玩家需将这枚炸弹料理妥当。

RAN2.original: PLACEHOLDER CUTSCENE~n~As the player steals the car~n~the cops arrive on the scene~n~and the bomb activates.
RAN2.translated: PLACEHOLDER CUTSCENE~n~当玩家在偷窃这辆车的时候~n~警察抵达了现场~n~炸弹也被激活了。

RAN2.original: Leaving the car, damaging it badly or running out of time will detonate the bomb.
RAN2.translated: 离开车辆，严重损毁或静待至倒计时结束均可引爆炸弹。

RAN2.original: Dump the car in the river before it explodes.
RAN2.translated: 在车爆炸前把它开进河里。

RAN2.original: Dump the car in the river before it explodes.
RAN2.translated: 在车爆炸前把它开进河里。

RAN2.original: Get to the ~b~car~s~ before the bomb goes off.
